entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 10 September 2016
